distribute.translation[0].definitions[0]: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way
Clothes and blankets have been distributed among the refugees.
a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
distribute.translation[0].definitions[1]: to supply goods to shops and companies so that they can sell them
Milk is distributed to the local shops by Herald’s Dairies.
distribute.translation[0].definitions[2]: to spread something over a large area
Make sure the weight of the load is evenly distributed.
distribute.translation[1].definitions[0]: to make goods available to customers after they have been produced
The new products will be sold under the Lipton brand and distributed by Pepsi.
distribute.translation[1].definitions[1]: to divide up a company’s profits for a particular period of time and give them to shareholders in the form of DIVIDENDs or new shares
One share of Celtrix will be distributed for every four Collagen shares held.
